answers.answer: Im 30 weeks and my son is at 3.7 pounds now

My daughter was about the same size at that time. I was so scared I was go to have a huge baby, but she turned out perfectly healthy and strong. Actually right when she came out the doctor said out loud "oh she's not fat at all". I think you are perfectly safe, this when your baby packs on its last few pounds.

I had the same thing at 32 weeks they were worried as it was massive gtowth spurt but had my 36 week and he hpad stayed in line with growth weighing in at 8 pounds now being induced monday so try not to worry also my blood sugar was all over the place inbetween 32 and 36 so dont stress x

I had the same thing at 32 weeks they were worried as it was massive gtowth spurt but had my 36 week and he hpad stayed in line with growth weighing in at 8 pounds now being induced monday so try not to worry also my blood sugar was all over the place inbetween 32 and 36 so dont stress x

Thank you I feel a little better my blood sugar fluctuates I actually lost 3.5 lbs and I'm eating healthier of course every now and then I get a sweet tooth but otherwise I'm doing good I feel guilty my baby is a little over weight and knowing it was my fault I feel guilty it was mostly in my 5th -6 month I ate a lot and not watching what I was eating. I have 6 weeks to go I hope he's weight stays under control plus I'm only 4"11 and some people tell me my belly looks big and some ask if I'm having twins :( how dare they good thing I didn't know those people and won't see them again.

question: I'm 32 and 6 days pregnant I have gestational diabetes my baby is weighing 5.14! That's a 35 week baby anyone else with a similar situation?
title: big Baby at 32 weeks!!
